arts.ttl: “Upset” Ole Gunnar Solskjaer hits out at “important” Manchester United transfer mistake
arts.sum: Former Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has suggested it was a mistake to let an “important” player like Scott McTominay go. The Norwegian tactician is currently in charge of Turkish giants Besiktas after a lengthy spell out of the game following his spell in charge of Man Utd. Solskjaer has spoke to the Athletic […] The post “Upset” Ole Gunnar Solskjaer hits out at “important” Manchester United transfer mistake appeared first on CaughtOffside.
